backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested frontend showcase changes to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files and assets.
frontend/.github/workflows/production-pu: GitHub Actions workflow validating production slug and deployment files on pushes and PRs.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide documenting production slug usage and required validation steps.
frontend/domain-slug.json: JSON config defining the productionSlug value for deployment.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/OKLCH color variables and base styling including dark mode settings.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, favicon, and script loading the React app.
frontend/scripts/validate-production-slu: Node script verifying domain-slug.json matches the required production slug.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling the main site sections and layout.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section with brand description and two-product image gallery.
frontend/src/components/BagGallery.tsx: Gallery component displaying product images and a materials showcase with six material categories.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Renders the Contact section with company contact info and includes the ContactForm component.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, simulated submission, and success message handling.
frontend/src/components/Features.tsx: Displays a grid of feature cards describing the company's strengths using predefined data.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, services, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with text, call‑to‑action buttons, and a video or image fallback.
frontend/src/components/SectionLayout.ts: Reusable layout wrapper that applies consistent spacing and container styling to sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, clearing identity, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom OKLCH color theme with global italic typography for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, radius, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Captures the project's current state, requirements, deployment notes, visual guidelines, and known issues for the Gal Fashion World website.
